album.title: I Look Real Good Today - Certified Hits

wiki.summary: "Smokin Out the Window" is a song by American superduo Silk Sonic, consisting of Bruno Mars and Anderson .Paak, released on November 5, 2021, by Aftermath Entertainment and Atlantic Records as the third single from Silk Sonic's debut studio album "An Evening with Silk Sonic". "Smokin Out the Window" was written by Mars, Brandon Anderson and Dernst Emile II, while the production was handled by Mars and D'Mile. Read more on Last.fm.
